Package org.apache.openjpa.xmlstore

Class XMLConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.openjpa.lib.conf.ConfigurationImpl
      • org.apache.openjpa.conf.OpenJPAConfigurationImpl
        • org.apache.openjpa.xmlstore.XMLConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.BeanInfo, java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, OpenJPAConfiguration, Configuration, ValueListener, Closeable
    public class XMLConfiguration
extends OpenJPAConfigurationImpl
    Configuration implementation for the XML file store. Each unique BrokerFactory has a distinct configuration instance. Thus this configuration is shared by all Brokers associated with the owning factory, and is a good place to provide access to shared resources. Note that each broker has its own AbstractStoreManager.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
